attributes.action: Stop wasting taxpayers money by replacing ALL tyres on police vehicles just because 1 tyre has a puncture or fault.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My local tyre depot has a stock pile of 'scrap' tyres. Most of the tyres are like new and some ARE new.
When I asked about these tyres I was informed that they would be sold on.
The new tyres have been fitted on the spare wheel and NEVER been on the road but some body in their wisdom decides that it is no longer fit for purpose. I suspect this is not unique to the police service and that it affects all emergency/government service vehicles.
When will this waste end?
